item.title: Outside the church StMary Magdalene, 14th December
item.description:

item.title: 2 stacks of cardboard opposite each other on the grass side of the entrance to Robert Bell House plus a large wire frame, 14th December
item.description:
This has been there for months. 1. It is a fire/ health hazard 2. It is attracting rats 3. Children are using the wire fence as a climbing frame which is dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rouel Road, Bermondsey, Greater London

item.title: Crossing button, 14th December
item.description:
One of the crossing buttons is stuck causing the lights to show red every 15 seconds to cross (even when there is no one at the crossing) . this causes traffic to back up rapidly .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Elmers End Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
